messages.subject: Cool books

messages.messageBody:
I think you guys will really appreciate these books!

This one is by an unschooler up in Canada. She's not on any lists that
I know of, but she does have a message board with an unschooling
thread. Her book, titled "The Birth House" sounds utterly lovely.
Check it out here:
http://www.thebirthhouse.com/description.htm

If you like the description of "The Birth House", check out some of
her other writing at soulfulliving.com (she wrote an article this last
issue) or at her website: http://www.amimckay.com/news.htm

She's a really neat lady!

I also found this one, while perusing a website. It's being used by
LLL, and has many pictures of little ones in slings. Very sweet, and
only $7.49 in print or a couple bucks for the download version:
http://books.lulu.com/content/63423
